name: 李政哲
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
schedule:
w1: Preliminaries: terminologies and inverse functions
w2: Preliminaries: two classical inverse functions
w3: Preliminaries: parametric equations + polar coordinates
w4: Limits and continuity: limits
w5: Limits and continuity: continuity + limit w/infinity
w6: Differentiation: introduction and definition of the derivatives
w7: Differentiation: computation skills of derivatives
w8: Differentiation:implicit differentiation + Mean Value Theorem
w9: Midterm
w10: Applications of Differentiation: Newton’s method+L’Hopital’s rule
w11: Applications of Differentiation: Curve sketching(I)
w12: Applications of Differentiation: Curve sketching(II) + optimization
w13: Integration: introduction + antiderivatives
w14: Integration: FTOC + integration skills(I)
w15: Integration: integration skills(II)
w16: Integration: integration skills(III)
w17: Integration: improper integral
w18: Final
